channel.title: Few minor problems
channel.description:
I know, that I'm stupid enough to make a server, but there are few things I want to know. >_<
1.How do I login to my server? [size=8pt]Do I have to type 0.0.0.0:43594?[/size] [size=8pt]Do I have to type MYSERVERNAME.HOSTNAME.LOLIFORGOT^^ ?[/size] [size=8pt]Do I have to type my router IP?[/size]

item.title: Few minor problems
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

If your server is online and port forwarded , you type in your local host (127.0.0.1) but others will have to type in your IP
If your server is just online for you, type in local host (127.0.0.1) on regular port

Read full topic
